question: What is the purpose of the "E-Step" scheme launched by the Karnataka government in August 2019?
explanation: To empower student start-ups is the main purpose of the "E-Step" scheme launched by the Karnataka government in August 2019. The Department of Information Technology, Bio-Technology and Science & Technology in Karnataka government through Karnataka Innovation and Technology Society (KITS) launched the E-step scheme in August 2019. The main aim is to promote an initiative to empower student start-ups.
